name: Prometheus: The Fire of Gods
description:
(Obs: This game is a re-upload of an old account that I had, I'm moving it here to keep all my games at the same active account)

A simple 5 levels platformer made for Ludum Dare 46 made in 48 hours.

Theme: Keep it alive.

As you move through the stages the fire runs out, so be careful! You have to keep the fire alive if you wanna finish these levels.

I hope you enjoy the game!

Controls: A, D: Move around Space: simple Jump W or ↑: Super jump (But it will consume your fire)

Assets Used:

  • UI Elements
    • Cione - Coral & White simple UI
    • MadFireOn - Simple UI Elements
  • Environment:
    • Blackspire - Nature pixel art
    • Twelve - TinyFire VFX 1.0
